siteOptions.blogdescription: WordPress Block Editor CSS Animation Demonstrations

steps.code: <?php require_once '/wordpress/wp-load.php'; wp_set_current_user(1); $css_animations = '.button-press { transition: all 0.1s ease; transform: translateY(0px); } .button-press:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); } .button-press:active { transform: translateY(2px); transition: all 0.05s ease; } .hover-color { transition: all 0.3s ease; } .hover-color:hover { color: crimson; } .hover-bg { transition: all 0.3s ease; } .hover-bg:hover { background-color: #f0f0f0; } .shadow-zoom { transition: all 0.3s ease; } .shadow-zoom:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } .fade-in { opacity: 0; animation: fadeIn 2s ease-in forwards; } @keyframes fadeIn { to { opacity: 1; } } .slide-in { transform: translateX(-100%); animation: slideIn 1s ease-out forwards; } @keyframes slideIn { to { transform: translateX(0); } } .pulse { animation: pulse 2s infinite; } @keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); } 50% { transform: scale(1.05); } } .rotate { transition: transform 0.5s ease; } .rotate:hover { transform: rotate(360deg); } .bounce { animation: bounce 1s infinite; } @keyframes bounce { 0%, 20%, 50%, 80%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); } 40% { transform: translateY(-10px); } 60% { transform: translateY(-5px); } }'; wp_add_inline_style('wp-block-library', $css_animations); echo 'CSS animations loaded successfully!'; ?>
